data.text:
Electrolysis is the only method of permanent hair removal that is approved by the British Medical Association.

About Face is Glasgow’s Premier Electrolysis Clinic

for permanent hair removal since 1986.

Download our Specialist Electrolysis Leaflet

Scroll Down for More Information

Unwanted hair is a problem for many, and the distress it can cause is vastly underestimated. More people have hair permanently removed by electrolysis than you might imagine.

Advanced Electrolysis can also alleviate many skin conditions >

Please make an appointment for your Consultation;

it is confidential and you are under no obligation to have treatment.

The treatment is approved by the medical profession and you should confirm:

(a) That your electrolysist uses sterile disposable probes, which are recommended by the Public Health Laboratory Service. You should have a brand new probe for each treatment.

(b) That your electrolysist is fully-qualified and preferably a registered member of the British Institute & Association of Electrolysis – don’t be afraid to ask to see a certificate.

This can vary greatly depending upon the individual. Some people may need only a short treatment every 6 – 8 weeks, while others may need to attend on a weekly basis initially.

Prices range from £29 for a 15 minute appointment to £79 for one hour. An average lip and chin area would require about half an hour to clear the hair which would cost £49. At the time of consultation, the electrolysist will give you a more accurate assessment as to the cost involved.

Remember, having a consultation puts you under no pressure to go ahead with treatment.

A 15 minute appointment includes up to 10 minutes of treatment. A 30 minute appointment includes up to 25 minutes of treatment and so on.
